heading: HB00098
0: AN ACT REPEALING ARTICLES 202 AND 341 OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE AND INSTITUTING A SYSTEM OF PROTECTION FOR VICTIMS OF PROSTITUTION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.;
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00098
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REPEALING ARTICLES 202 AND 341 OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE AND INSTITUTING A SYSTEM OF PROTECTION FOR VICTIMS OF PROSTITUTION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : The Anti-prostitution Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Addresses the factors that perpetuate prostitution and thereby ensuring an environment that will eradicate this in the long term.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE JESUS, EMMI A., BROSAS, ARLENE D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
